Title: Authorizes the department of motor vehicles to establish a program encouraging persons to scrap such person's petroleum or diesel motor vehicle in favor of a zero emission or electric motor vehicle
Summary: Authorizes the department of motor vehicles to establish a program encouraging persons to scrap such person's petroleum or diesel motor vehicle in favor of a zero emission or electric motor vehicle by providing a five hundred dollar rebate for the purchase of such new zero emission or electric motor vehicle.
LawCode: Add ยง224-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a reimbursement program encouraging persons to scrap such person's petroleum or diesel motor vehicle to purchase a zero emission or electric motor vehicle
